definition: to bathe/to cleanse/to receive/to be given
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: The Dove range now covers skin creams, shampoos and shower gels .
sentences.chinese: 多芬品牌如今包括护肤霜，洗发水和沐浴露。

sentences.english: The evaluation methods for functions of shampoo and bath lotions in Japan were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了日本洗发精和沐浴露的功能性评价方法。

sentences.english: Or to buy a baby and, like human skin was weak of body wash it .
sentences.chinese: 还是给宝宝买和人体皮肤一样呈弱酸性的沐浴露吧。

sentences.english: Shampoo and body lotions are also used to wash our hair and body.
sentences.chinese: 我们也用香波和沐浴露清洁头发和身体。

sentences.english: I use this product as shampoo, body wash, bubble bath.
sentences.chinese: 我把这个产品作为洗发水，沐浴露，泡泡浴使用。

sentences.english: Desert Essence Organics Italian Red Grape Body Wash is enriched with natural, botanical ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 沙漠有机意大利红葡萄精华沐浴露富含天然植物成分。

sentences.english: Can substitute for body wash, preferably for continual massage.
sentences.chinese: 可替代沐浴露使用，持续按摩吸收更好。

sentences.english: Escape to the tropics with Nature's Gate Papaya Velvet Moisture Body Wash.
sentences.chinese: 天然之扉木瓜丝滑保湿沐浴露带您独享热带风情。

sentences.english: I am using this soap in combination with the foaming milk bath and the body butter.
sentences.chinese: 我现在和牛奶泡沫沐浴露及身体乳一起用。

definition: shower puff/bath sponge/bath ball (containing aromas or salts)
